line.text:
Delays  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:03PM

Due to signal problems at 207 St, northbound [1] trains are running with delays. 

Allow additional travel time.

Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:04PM

Due to signal problems at Grand Central-42 St, some northbound [4] and [5] trains local from Brooklyn Bridge-City Hall to 125 St.

Expect delays in northbound [6] train service.

Allow additional travel time.

Planned Work
[7] Flushing-bound trains skip 82, 90, 103 and 111 Sts

Days, 10:15 AM to 3 PM, Mon and Tue, Mar 30 - 31

For service to these stations, take the [7] to Junction Blvd or Willets Point
and transfer to a Times Sq-bound [7].

For service from these stations, take the [7] to Junction Blvd or 74 St
and transfer to a Flushing-bound [7].

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:29PM

Following an earlier incident at Utica Av, [A] train service has resumed with residual delays.

line.name: SIR
line.text:
Planned Work
[SIR] Boarding Change at Richmond Valley, Nassau and Atlantic Stations

Days, 9 AM to 3 PM, Mon to Thu, Mar 30 - Apr 2

• All trains board at the St. George-bound platform.




Planned Work
[SIR] Trains may not connect with the Staten Island Ferry

Days, 9 AM to 3 PM, Mon to Thu, Mar 30 - Apr 2

Due to planned system maintenance, trains will depart St. George Terminal without delay.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: B1 - B84
line.text:
Planned Detour
B63 buses may experience delays due to road work on 5 Av between 7 St and 8 St

7 AM to 4 PM, daily, until further notice

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
B38/B38 LTD - Eastbound buses rerouted from Lafayette Av between
Stuyvesant Av and Malcolm X Blvd

Until further notice

Due to construction, buses make corresponding stops along the detoured route.

Show Reroute Details
Via Lafayette Av
Right on Stuyvesant Av
Left on Greene Av
Left on Malcolm X Blvd
Right on Lafayette Av then regular route


Reminder: B38 LTD buses do not operate overnight.




Planned Detour
B24 and B46/B46 LTD buses detoured from the Entrance on Broadway at Washington Plz Terminal

Until further notice

Due to construction, buses operate as follows:

Via Broadway
Right on Roebling St into Washington Plaza.




Planned Detour
B20 and Q24 - Northbound/Westbound buses detoured from Van Sinderen Av at Broadway
Junction due to construction - No stops missed

Until further notice

Show Reroute Details
Via Jamaica Av
Into Fulton St
Right on Eastern Pkwy
Left on Broadway then regular route


Reminder: B20 buses do not operate overnight.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:08PM

Bx34 buses detoured, due to NYPD activity on Valentine Av and 198 St.

Detour is as follows:

Southbound: Via Bainsbridge Av, right on Bedford Pk Blvd, left on Grand Concourse, left on Kingsbridge Rd, right on Valentine Av and regular route.

Corresponding stops will be made along detour.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:05PM

Bx11 buses are detoured, due to road work on West Farms Rd between Jennings St and E 172 St.

Detour is as follows:

Westbound: Via West Farms Rd, left on Jennings St, right on Longfellow Av, left on E 172 St and regular route.

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: BXM1 - BXM18
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:08PM

BxM3, BxM4, BxM6, BxM7, BxM8, BxM9, BxM10, BxM11, M1, M2, M3, M4, M66 and M72 buses are detoured or delayed due to a street blockage on the 66 St Transverse.

Detour is as follows:

M66 Westbound: Via 67 St, right turn on Madison Av, left turn on 79 St, continue straight to Transverse Rd to Central Park West, left turn on Central Park West, right turn on 66 St and regular route.

5 Av and 67 St bus stop will be bypassed. Customers may use the bus stop o 67 St and Madison Av.

M66 Eastbound: Via 65 St, left turn on Central Park West, right turn on 79 St, right turn on 5 Av, left turn on 65 St and regular route.

M72 Eastbound: Via 72 St, left turn on Central Park West, right turn on Transverse Rd, right turn on 5 Av, left turn on 65 St and regular route.

Bus stop at Central Park West and 70 St will be bypassed. Customers can use the bus stop at 72 St and Central Park West.

M72 Westbound: Via 72 St, right on Madison Av, left on 79 St, continue straight on Transverse Rd, left turn on Central Park West, right turn on 72 St and regular route.

Bus stop at 5 Av and 72 St will be made on 72 St and Madison Av instead.

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:08PM

BxM3, BxM4, BxM6, BxM7, BxM8, BxM9, BxM10, BxM11, M1, M2, M3, M4, M66 and M72 buses are detoured or delayed due to a street blockage on the 66 St Transverse.

Detour is as follows:

M66 Westbound: Via 67 St, right turn on Madison Av, left turn on 79 St, continue straight to Transverse Rd to Central Park West, left turn on Central Park West, right turn on 66 St and regular route.

5 Av and 67 St bus stop will be bypassed. Customers may use the bus stop o 67 St and Madison Av.

M66 Eastbound: Via 65 St, left turn on Central Park West, right turn on 79 St, right turn on 5 Av, left turn on 65 St and regular route.

M72 Eastbound: Via 72 St, left turn on Central Park West, right turn on Transverse Rd, right turn on 5 Av, left turn on 65 St and regular route.

Bus stop at Central Park West and 70 St will be bypassed. Customers can use the bus stop at 72 St and Central Park West.

M72 Westbound: Via 72 St, right on Madison Av, left on 79 St, continue straight on Transverse Rd, left turn on Central Park West, right turn on 72 St and regular route.

Bus stop at 5 Av and 72 St will be made on 72 St and Madison Av instead.

Allow additional travel time.



Delays  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:07PM

M5, M7, M66 and M104 buses are running with delays southbound, due to construction on Broadway and 65 St.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:07PM

M14A and M22 buses are detoured, due to construction on Cherry St and Jackson St.

Detour is as follows:

M14A Eastbound: Via Grand St, left turn on Lewis St, left turn on Delancy St, left turn on Columbia St, left on Delancy St, right on Lewis St, right on Grand St and regular route.

M14A Westbound: Grand St and FDR bus stop, Cherry St and Jackson St bus stop, Jackson St and Madison St bus stop will be bypassed. Customer can us the Grand St and Abraham Kazan St bus stop.

M22 Eastbound: Via Madison St, left on Jackson St, right on Grand St, left on Lewis St, left on Delancy St, left on Columbia St, left on Delancy St, right on Lewis St, left on Grand St, right on Madison St and regular route.

Madison St and Grand St bus stop, Grand St and FDR bus stop will not be made. Customers can use the bus stop on Madison St and Gouvener St instead.

M22 Westbound: Grand St and FDR bus stop, Cherry St and Jackson St bus stop, Jackson St and Madison St bus stop will be bypassed. Customer may use the Madison St and Jackson St bus stop instead.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:06PM

M100 buses are detoured, due to construction on E 125 St and 1 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Eastbound: Via 125 St, left on 3 Av, right on E 127 St, right on 2 Av, stand at near side of E 126 St.

Allow additional travel time. 



Delays  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:04PM

M1, M2, M3, M5, M14A, M14D, M21 and M103 buses are running with delays in both directions, due to a street closure on 2 Av between 14 St and E Houston St.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:04PM

M8, M15 and M15-SBS buses are detoured, due to a partial building collapse on 2 Av at 8 St.

Detour is as follows:

M15 and M15-SBS Southbound: Via 2 Av, right on 23 St, left on 3 Av, left on Houston St, right on Chrystie St and regular route.

M8 Eastbound: Via St. Marks Pl, left on 3 Av, right on 14 St, right on Avenue A, left on 10 St and regular route.

All corresponding stops will be made on the detoured route.

M8, M14A and M14D are running with extensive delays in both directions.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
M8 buses rerouted from 2 Av at 8 St (St Marks Pl)

Until further notice

Due to FDNY activity, buses make corresponding stops along the detoured route in both directions.

Show Reroute Details
Eastbound
Via St Marks Pl
Left on 3 Av
Right on 14 St
Right on Avenue A
Left on 10 St then regular route

Westbound
Via 9 St
Right on 1 Av
Left on 14 St
Left on 3 Av
Right on 9 St then regular route


Reminder: M8 buses do not operate overnight.




Planned Detour
M2/M2 LTD, M3 and M21 buses may experience delays due to street closure on 2 Av
between 14 St and E Houston St

Until further notice

• Please allow additional travel time.

Reminder: M2 LTD, M3, and M21 buses do not operate overnight.





Planned Detour
M15/M15 SBS - Southbound buses rerouted from 2 Av at 8 St

Until further notice

Due to FDNY activity, buses run via 3 Av and Bowery making corresponding stops.

Show Reroute Details
Via 2 Av
Right on 14 St
Left on 3 Av
Left on Houston St
Right on Chrysite St then regular route


Reminder: M15 SBS buses do not operate overnight.




Planned Detour
M15/M15 SBS - Northbound bus stop on 1 Av at 28 St temporarily closed

Until Summer 2015

Due to construction, please use nearby stops:

M15: 1 Av at 25 St.
M15 SBS: 1 Av at 24 St.

Reminder: M15 SBS buses do not operate overnight.




Planned Detour
M15 - Northbound bus stop on 1 Av between E 86 St and E 87 St temporarily relocated

Until further notice

Due to construction, please use the temporary stop on 1 Av at E 87 St.




Planned Detour
M1/M1 LTD, M5/M5 LTD M14A/M14D and M103 buses may experience delays
due to street closure on 2 Av between 14 St and E Houston St

Until further notice

• Please allow additional travel time.

Reminder: M1 LTD, M5 LTD buses do not operate overnight or weekends.

line.name: S40 - S98
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:06PM

S46, S53 and S54 buses are detoured due to pothole repair on Castleton Av from Broadway to Clove Rd.

Detour is as follows:

S46 South Ferry Bound: Via Castleton Av, right on Clove Rd, left on Cary Av, left on Bement, right on Castleton Av and regular route.

S46 West Shore Bound: Via Castleton Av, left on Bement Av, right on Cary Av, right on Clove Rd, left on Castleton Av and regular route.

S53 Pt Richmond Bound: Via Broadway, left on Cary AV, right on Clove Rd, left on Castleton Av and regular route.

S53 Brooklyn Bound: Via Castleton Av, right on Clove Rd, left on Cary Av, right on Broadway and regular route.

S54 Hylan Blvd Bound: Via Richmond Terr, left on Clove Rd and regular route.

S54 Clove Rd Bound: Via Richmond Terr, right on Henderson Av, left on Wayne St and regular route.

Allow additional travel time.

line.name: Verrazano-Narrows
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 03/16/2015  6:24AM

VNB - UPPER LEVEL TRAFFIC PATTERN

 

Monday thru Thursday: 5 AM to 9:30 AM (3) Lanes Brooklyn-bound. (2) Lanes Staten Island-bound.

2:30 PM to 10PM (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

 

 Friday: 5 AM to 9:30 AM (3) Lanes Bklyn-bnd. (2) Lanes Staten Island-bound.

1:30 PM to 11:59 PM (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

 

 Saturday and Sunday:

 Three (3) Lanes Staten Island-bound. Two (2) Lanes Brooklyn-bound.

line.name: Ronkonkoma
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 03/30/2015  6:58AM

The LIRR is experiencing up to 25 minute delays on the Ronkonkoma Branch due to the derailment of a freight car west of Wyandanch Station. Trains will be operating at a reduced speed between Farmingdale and Wyandanch.

Delays  Posted: 03/30/2015  2:16PM

Westbound

The 1:11PM train from Ronkonkoma due Penn at 2:32PM is operating 18 minutes late due to the derailment of a freight care west of Wyandanch.
